akas: The Iridium Next constellation story France (new title)
akas from release info: The Iridium Next constellation story France (new title)

1.title: Launch of the first batch
1.plot: On January 14, 2017, SpaceX launches the first batch of Iridium® NEXT satellites. Follow the team who is transforming the future of global telecommunications.

2.title: The delicate dance
2.plot: Replacing the world largest satellite constellation without service disruption is a world first. Managing this "delicate dance" process: that's the tremendous job being done at the Iridium Satellite Network Operations Center (SNOC).

3.title: One world one phone
3.plot: Iridium : a genius idea inspired by a woman. Look back to the 80s and 90s, to understand how the constellation was created.

4.title: The man who saved Iridium
4.plot: In the year 2000, Iridium satellites were 12 hours away from being deorbited. Watch the incredible story of Dan Colussy, "The Man who saved Iridium"

imdb.plot outline: At this very second, 485 miles above our heads, a technological marvel orbits the Earth. Its name: Iridium Next. It is the most ambitious telecommunications project of all time. Follow the men and women who are transforming the future of global communications. The Iridium Next constellation series tackle the human and technical challenges to develop and put in orbit the world's largest satellite constellation. Each episode follows a major milestone of the Iridium Next program, giving the audience a sense of history in the making.

plot: At this very second, 485 miles above our heads, a technological marvel orbits the Earth. Its name: Iridium Next. It is the most ambitious telecommunications project of all time.

At this very second, 485 miles above our heads, a technological marvel orbits the Earth. Its name: Iridium Next. It is the most ambitious telecommunications project of all time.
